product_name: Louis Garneau Comp Sleeveless Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Louie Garneau Comp Sleeveless top molds perfectly to the curves of the body for excellent muscle support for triathletes. Train on the bike, in the pool and on the street. Chlorine-resistant nylon/spandex fabric keeps its stretch even if training in a pool; fabric dries quickly, wicks moisture for quick evaporation and provides a supportive fit. Flatlock seams maximize motion and minimize abrasion. 3/4-length hidden zipper. Armholes and neckline are designed to accommodate a full range of motion. 2 angled back pockets store training essentials; headphone outlet allows wires to be channeled inside the Comp Sleeveless top. Front and rear reflective accents enhance visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The Louie Garneau Comp Sleeveless top molds perfectly to the curves of the body for excellent muscle support for triathletes. Train on the bike, in the pool and on the street.
